title: WTB Walter Johnson Weiser Wonder postcard
author: CrackaJackKid

posts.post_title: WTB Walter Johnson Weiser Wonder postcard
posts.post_content: Please let me know what you have. Pm me.

Which one are you looking for? I think that there is only one known real photo postcard  From 1907 known to exist. It was on ebay years ago.  

Maybe I am getting it confused with something else, but I think that there is only one.

Here you go, sorry my scans have since disappeared but here are the 4 versions...

[URL="https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=223928"]Link[/URL]
Nice collection. Thanks for posting them. I did not know that there were four different. I hope that the original poster is able to find one. They are really cool postcards.
No problem, posted just for reference (I do not own any of these).
